import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const PostPage = ({ posts, handleDelete }) => { const { id } = useParams(); const post = posts.find(post => (post.id).toString() === id); return (
{post && <>

{post.title}

{post.datetime}

{post.body}

} {!post && <>

Post Not Found

Well, that's disappointing

Visit Our HomePage

}
) } export default PostPage
